Class PriceList

Object
PriceList
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PriceList extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the pricing information regarding ticket pricing

  • Constructor Details

    • PriceList

      public PriceList()

    • PriceList

      public PriceList(double basePrice, EnumMap<AgeGroup,Double> agePricing, EnumMap<CinemaClass,Double> cinemaPricing, EnumMap<MovieType,Double> movieTypePricing, double holidayPrice)
      Creates a list of prices to be assigned for each aspect of ticket pricing
      Parameters:
      basePrice - Base price of a ticket
      agePricing - Mapping of age groups to specific modifier values
      cinemaPricing - Mapping of cinema classes to specific modifier values
      movieTypePricing - Mapping of movie types to specific modifier values
      holidayPrice - Additional price charged for holidays/weekends
